step3.description: For large quantity orders, you need to pay a minimum Down Payment (DP) of 30% of the total price to confirm your order. Payment can be made via bank transfer.

step4.title: 4. Shipping & Full Payment
step4.description: For delivery, full payment must be completed before the products are shipped. We will inform you once your order is ready along with the shipping tracking number if available.
